text: is a Japanese professional wrestler. He is best known for working with Big Japan Pro Wrestling (BJW). Kasai is known for wrestling in violent hardcore wrestling matches. He is nicknamed the Crazy Monkey. He has also worked for HUSTLE, Ice Ribbon, Combat Zone Wrestling (CZW) and FREEDOMS. ==Championships== *Apache Pro-Wrestling/Apache Army **WEW World Tag Team Championship (two times) (with Jaki Numazawa (one) and Tomoaki Honma (one)) *Big Japan Pro Wrestling **WEW Hardcore Tag Team Championship (one time) (with The W*NGer) **BJW Tag Team Championship (three times) (with Jaki Numazawa) *Ice Ribbon **International Ribbon Tag Team Championship (one time) (with Miyako Matsumoto) *Combat Zone Wrestling **CZW World Tag Team Championship (one time) (with Men's Teioh) **CZW World Junior Heavyweight Championship (one time) **CZW Ultraviolent Underground Championship (one time) *Independent Wrestling Association East Coast **Masters of Pain (2006) ==References== ==Other websites== *Cagematch profile Category:1974 births Category:Japanese professional wrestlers Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Hokkaido
title: Jun Kasai
